root.para: In addition, cash movements may be quite small in the context of the overall size of the trade or the entityâ€™s own balance sheet and, therefore, may be difficult to identify. The value of reconciliations is enhanced when finance or other administrative and support services staff review entries in all general ledger accounts to ensure that they are valid and supportable. This process will help identify if the other side-to-cash entries relating to financial instruments have not been properly recorded. Reviewing suspense and clearing accounts is important, regardless of the account balance, because there may be offsetting reconciling items in the account.
